thread.title: Danniella Westbrook flaunts tummy in tiny crop top as she practices yoga by the pool during Marbella break
thread.title_full: Danniella Westbrook flaunts tummy in tiny crop top as she practices yoga by the pool during Marbella break

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Danniella Westbrook flaunts tummy in tiny crop top as she practices yoga by the pool during Marbella break
text:
Danniella Westbrook flaunts tummy in tiny crop top as she practices yoga by the pool during Marbella break The actress has been showcasing her frame in a number of skimpy looks Share Danniella Westbrook shows off her yoga poses (Photo: XPOSURE) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Judging by these pictures, it wasn't all partying for Danniella Westbrook during her recent Marbella getaway. 
The former EastEnders actress got back from the Spanish holiday resort earlier this week, but new pictures show her posing up a storm as she practices a number of yoga poses poolside. 
Danniella, who has clearly been working hard in the gym lately, was showing off her tummy in a tiny maroon crop top and matching shorts. 
Alongside her trainer Danni Levy, the 43-year-old was snapped stretching, bending and balancing in the sunshine as she was put through her paces. (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) 
The pictures came in stark contrast to the recent snaps of her leaving a kebab shop in the early hours of the morning. 
Earlier this week Danniella was spotted picking up food at 3am and taking selfies inside the takeaway shop before jumping into a taxi. 
The actress, who was dressed down in a black hooded sweater, black trousers, a fur gillet and trainers, stuck her tongue out to cameras before disappearing into the night. 
It's been a busy few weeks for the actress who indulged in everything from pole dancing to snogging Human Ken Doll Rodrigo Alves. Read More (Photo: Instagram/danniellawestbrook) (Photo: Instagram/danniellawestbrook) 
And as she jetted back she expressed how sad she was to leave as she shared a picture taken out of the plane window on Instagram. 
She wrote: "Sad to leave but time to go xoxoxo." 
Danniella also said she was feeling "blessed" that she'd managed to turn her life around, writing alongside a selfie: "Super excited to board the plane home to the UK excited to see my babies my mates and get back to work a busy life and no ones wife is a life well lived.. 
"Feeling super blessed at the turn around in my life lately.. hard work determination and never ever letting my problems, my mental health, my bad choices in who I've trusted get the better of me. Read More Danniella updated her look with long blonde extensions (Photo: danniellawestbrook/Instagram) Fans loved her new look (Photo: danniellawestbrook/Instagram) 
"Everything happens for a reason and out of every bad time comes some good. Strength keeps growing my character builds and my faith deepens.. my heart still on my sleeve and my loyalty never broken .. I'm truly grateful for everything I have and for the people I share that with [sic]." 
Meanwhile, Danniella has said said she'd love to return to her role in EastEnders - but fears bosses would just "use" her for PR. She got a new hair do while she was there (Photo: danniellawestbrook/Instagram) 
When asked if she'd ever think about returning to the show, Danniella told The Sun Online : "Always, love EastEnders. The last time I went back fans [wanted me back] because [Sam’s] a superbitch and there’s good tension between her and Sharon and all that stuff. 
"And now because you haven’t got the Pauline, Peggy and Pat types older characters and it needs Sam, Sharon and Roxy but they just won’t do it. 
"They just will not do it. They have said I’m sacked, I’m this and that, they seem to use me for PR and not for the work." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
